code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from"react";import{Formik,Form,Field}from"formik";import*as Yup from"yup";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{Button}from"src/components";import*as S from"./styled";import{jsx as ___EmotionJSX}from"@emotion/react";export var HabitTime=function HabitTime(){var navigate=useNavigate();var initialValues={morning:"",night:"",sleep:"",break:""};useEffect(function(){if(!localStorage.getItem("accessToken")){navigate("/auth/login");alert("로그인해야 이용 가능한 서비스입니다.");}},[]);var validationSchema=Yup.object().shape({morning:Yup.string().required("기상시간"),night:Yup.string().required("취침시간"),sleep:Yup.string().required("낮잠"),break:Yup.string().required("휴식")});var onSubmit=function onSubmit(data){axios.post("http://localhost:8080/myhabit",data,{headers:{accessToken:localStorage.getItem("accessToken")}}).then(function(response){navigate("/time/goal");});};return ___EmotionJSX(React.Fragment,null,___EmotionJSX(S.InputTimeContainer,null,___EmotionJSX(S.InputContainer,null,___EmotionJSX(Formik,{initialValues:initialValues,onSubmit:onSubmit,validationSchema:validationSchema},___EmotionJSX(Form,{style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column"}},___EmotionJSX("label",null,"\uAE30\uC0C1\uC2DC\uAC04H"),___EmotionJSX(S.InputTime,{autoComplete:"off",name:"morning"}),___EmotionJSX("label",null,"\uCDE8\uCE68\uC2DC\uAC04H"),___EmotionJSX(S.InputTime,{autoComplete:"off",name:"night"}),___EmotionJSX("label",null,"\uB0AE\uC7A0\uC2DC\uAC04H"),___EmotionJSX(S.InputTime,{autoComplete:"off",name:"sleep"}),___EmotionJSX("label",null,"\uD734\uC2DD\uC2DC\uAC04H"),___EmotionJSX(S.InputTime,{autoComplete:"off",name:"break"}),___EmotionJSX(Button,{style:{width:"13.5rem"},type:"submit"},"\uC81C\uCD9C"))))));};
